name: Eugene WATSON, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole, Appellee

judges: Justice FITZGERALD would grant oral argument.
parties: Eugene WATSON, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 17th day of October, 2007, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
Justice FITZGERALD would grant oral argument.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
933 A.2d 650
Eugene WATSON, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole, Appellee.

Oct. 17, 2007.
